document.full_text: egypt's popular uprising may have arrived just in time to save a neolithic site that holds the country's oldest evidence of agriculture and could yield vital clues to the rise of pharaonic civilization.
document.title: egypt's revolution may save neolithic treasure
lines_and_colors: egypt's popular uprising may have arrived just in time to save a neolithic site that holds the country's oldest evidence of agriculture and could yield vital clues to the rise of pharaonic civilization.
